title: (x) Tishman Speyer logo uppercase sans - Gotham {Yves}
content:
Hello together,

after visiting this forum for some time now and using the ID-section as my personal quiz-show I finally registered to throw something in myself.

Thanx.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [TishmanSpeyer.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019033444/http:/typophile.com/files/TishmanSpeyer.jpg) | 8.94 KB |
author: Jan

comments.content: 47 seconds, is that good enough to compete in your quiz-show. ;^)

Well, actually I wouldn't consider myself experienced enough to compete with the hawkeyes here.

Thanks a lot. Beautiful Typeface.
Wait that logo looks familiar, Didn't The Muppet Show have a similar sponsor with that same design, just in rainbow colors? It's been a long time, so I could be talking out my butt here.

Good memory! That was ITC entertainment, who used a logo very similar:  
 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ITC\_Entertainment](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019033444/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ITC_Entertainment "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ITC\_Entertainment")

Jason C
I'm impressed you found that. All I could do was remember the shapes, how did you even begin to find that?

I remembered it was 3 letters, beginning with I. But then I started googling muppet show, and found it that way.

Jason C
